articles.title: Gilas' 3x3 Asia Cup gold medal dream run ends after New Zealand semis beatdown - Rappler
articles.description: New Zealand bullies its way to the FIBA 3x3 Asia Cup finals at the expense of Gilas Pilipinas' gold medal pursuit at the continental tournament
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines New Zealand dashed Gilas Pilipinas Men’s gold medal dream hopes at the 2022 FIBA 3×3 Asia Cup after a dominant 21-13 beatdown in Singapore on Sunday, July 10.

articles.title: The Singaporean producer who helped bring award-winning films such as Pop Aye and Wet Season to the big screen - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: In this week's instalment of Creative Capital, meet Tan Si En, 29, one of the youngest film producers in Singapore. Already, she has worked with celebrated directors, including Anthony Chen and Kirsten Tan.
articles.content: Tan also co-founded film and TV company Momo Film Co with her partner Kris Ong in 2018. Three years later, Singapore-based Beach House Pictures, which is part of Canadas Blue Ant Media, acquired a ma… [+778 chars]
